message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value of costs related to general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, the line item that represents the general management and administration costs is "Administrative Expenses", which has a value of 1,192,395.86.

This line item typically includes costs related to the overall administration of a company, such as executive salaries, office expenses, legal and accounting fees, and other overhead costs not directly tied to production or sales activities.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1192395.86'} }
```
